text: Cloudy and light brown. Has some bready notes and maybe some phenols. Thin, has more of that bready note. Maybe a touch of tartness. Odd example.
Bottle. Pours a hazy golden pale amber color with a small white head. Has a fruity malty spicy herbal aroma. Fruity malty spicy flavor with hints of caramel. Has a fruity malty spicy caramel finish.
Bottled. A hazy amber beer with a beige head. The aroma has notes of straw, fruits, and malt. The flavor is sweet with notes of malt, fruits, and straw, leading to a bitter to a tart finish.

Bottle at yespr.
Hazy orange colored with notes small white head.
Fruity aroma of orange peel and citrus.
Fruity flavor of caramel and citrus with you of yeast.
Fruity finish.

Fruity and yeasty with some notes of straw, some floral and light herbal hoppy notes, some touches of salt into the close.
33 cl. bottle. A hazy orange coloured beer with an off-white head. Aroma and flavour of malt, hops, fruit, yeast, spice, berries and sweetness.
33 cl bottle. Pours hazy orange with a small off white head. Aroma is yeasty and toasted malty. Mild fruity. Bitter and slight herbal. Dry, hoppy and mild fruity finish.

33cl bottle @Cimmeria,Oviedo. 07-01-2016.
"5ª Cata RateBeer Asturias".
BBD:Jan 2016.
Some rye nose and taste. Sweet, harh cereal. Some salty notes. Pours clear amber.
Gul öl med ett mindre vitt skum. Doft och smak är jäst, hö, malt, lätt kryddighet och lätt bärig syrlighet.
Bottle. Aroma has hints of ammoniac. Taste is a bit sour. Very carbonated.

Bottle. Orange golden hazy. Some peasasparagus on nose, malty, sweet malty dark honey. Med bodied, peas. Bit rubbery oily palate, yeast dough. A farmhousy ale. Bit thin, med bittered. Bit grainy flavour. Tastes very traditional.-- rated with beerbasher/winphone

Flaske fra Systembolaget Visby, på terassen i Tingstäde: uklar oransjegylden med ok skum. Svak aroma av malt, urter, nellik. Særegen smak, søtlig, svakt humlet, og med preg av gjær, halvvisne urter, høy og halm. Opplevdes som ufrisk og vammel, selv for tradisjonsøl.

330ml bottle from Systembolaget, web order. Clear amber with a dense off-white head that leaves some lacing. Sweet malty aroma, dried fruit, soap, cloves and yeast. Thin and soft mouthfeel. Fruity and malty taste apricot, banana, yeast, bread, grass and hay. Short finish.
Bottle. Clear amber color with with small creamy white mostly lasting head. Malty. Aroma. Sweet. And. Bitter flavor.
Bottle. Frothy white fair mostly deminishing head. Yellow colour. Moderate malty and light hoppy aroma. Light bitter flavor. Average light bitter finish. Oily palate.
KØLF 290116. Golden colour with an off-white head. Flavour is yeast, berries, malt, herbs, wheat, grain, caramel, bread. Boring beer.

0,33l bottle at home shared with Saeglopur from trade with Nische, big thanks. BB 07/2018. amber rather hazy color, small white head. smells of ripe fruits, earthy, bit smoky, grassy bitter, light yeasty. bit weird smell, not totally my thing. medium body, rather bubbly carbonation, slick mouthfeel. tastes rather sweet, some ripe fruits, peach, banana, light yeasty, hints of earthiness, bit glueish, light citric. finishes bubbly dry with notes of ripe fruits and a bit bitter / sweet. liked the taste quite a bit better than the smell, if you close your nose this thing is rather drinkable. overall just a step above decent.

330 ml bottle bb 07/2018 shared by Werckmeister, thanks!
Dark amberto copper, hazy body, with a medium, dissipating, fizzy, light beige head.
Aroma of dried fruits, spices, flowers, some barnyard, some cheese, bread, some pepper.
Tastes of lemongrass, herbs, apples, spices, flowers, yeast, bread, wheat, some pepper.
Light, slick mouthfeel, with a quite lively carbonation.
Finishes dry, a bit bitter, spicy, herbal, floral, yeasty, wheaty, a bit bready.

Good. Quite variant, even a bit complex, with a mix of Saison and Hefeweizen aromas. Drinks easy and fresh. Nothing special overall, but interesting.

Bottle. Pours golden with an off-white head. Aroma of malt, some herbal notes, yeast grains. Flavor is sweet and malty with some toffee, caramel, fruitiness and yeast. Medium body, average carbonation.

Botella. Thanks Omhper @V Cata Ratebeer Asturias. 07/01/16 BBD: 01/16
Color amarillo, sabores dulces, herbales, no muy agradable.

Flaska. Något oklar bärnstensfärgad öl med ett stort gulvitt skum som fort sjunker ihop. Dofter av kryddor, bröd, citrus och malt. Smakinslag av torkad frukt, citrus, kardemumma, bröd, malt och karamell. Torr munkänsla. Kort avslutning.

Appearance: Redish dark golden, slightly hazy with some white head.
Aroma: Wheat, slight fruit, spices.
Taste: Fruit, wheat, some spices. A bit odd.
Bought: Trade with Nisse666 - thanks!, 330 ml
Info: 30/12-2015, BB: 31/1-2016

33cl bottle from a trade with Cunningham - thanks a lot! Pours close to clear deep golden to amber with a modest, white head. Malty and somewhat bready aroma with notes of ripe fruits, caramel and spices. Medium sweet with peculiar flavour and not much bitterness nor acididty. Interesting enough.

On bottle with visionthing, thanks a lot! Hazy amber color, ok foam- small bubbels and good carbonation. Medium aroma intensity; slightly roasted, maty, dried fruits,some red berries quite fruity with good yeast influence. Medium body & complexity. Some bitterness, balances well. Enjoyable

Pours a clear dark amber color, topped with a medium sized white head. Very soapy with no retention. Immediately disappears. Grainy aroma with some herbal presence. A hint of bacon. Taste is sweet, gentle with some soury notes, but very mild - they have herbal quality. Not a bad one, very drinkable. Decent.
Eine gewisse Getreidigkeit gepaart mit einer ebenso unbestimmten Würze. Etwas dumpf auf der Zunge mit einer gewissen Pappigkeit. Trinkbar, ungewöhnlich, ganz ok.

Bottle from trade. The beer has got a cloudy orange-amber colour with a small head and medium body. Aroma of malt, bread and oranges. Taste of malt, bread, oranges, spices, herbs and dust, Malty-dusty finish.

330ml bottle, from trade with Omhper - Many thanks! Pours hazy deep amber with small head. Good initial murky orange flavours, settling to an unfortunate bland, lightly spicy tone with a little syrup. Good to try a Gotlandsdrike but not really setting off fireworks for me.

Bottle 330ml. [ As Barlingbo Bysen No:1 ].Clear medium orange yellow color with a small to average, frothy, fair lacing, mostly diminishing, off-white head. Aroma is moderate malty, sweet malt, pale malt, light to moderate yeasty, wood, light vegetables. Flavor is moderate sweet with a average duration, pale malt, sweet malt, light yeasty, vegetable notes. Body is medium, texture is oily to watery, carbonation is soft. [20151024]

Bottle from Nisse_66, thanks! Fruity, yeasty and spicy smell. A bit phenolic. Taste is a bit sweet and also spritsy. Some band aid but not overpowering. Kind of spicy taste. Weird beer, not sure if bad, intended or meant to be this way.
Bottle (thanks finol). Cant say wheter this Gotlandsdricke is true to style or not. Mild in all aspects. Yeasty, sweet and fruity.
light malty aroma,golden, clear, white foam, light sweetness, lightly bitter, light body, oily feel, soft carbonation, fizzy, light frsh finish.
Sahti? Amber coloured and clear. Has a white head, diminishing. Sweet aroma, light acid.

Bottle @ Johns. Pours golden with a creamy white head. Aroma of malt, wheat, yeast, light sweet fruit. Flavor is light sweet, malt, wheat, yeast, sweet fruit. Medium body, average carbonation, light sweet finish. 241015
Bottle. Nice head with good duration. Color is amber. Aroma and taste are fruits, caramel, wheat malt and hops.

Bottle, 5.5%. Clear amber with small white head. Aroma is malt, wheat, yeast, caramel and a little bitter. Flavoru is malt, caramel, toasted, wheat, little banana, medium sweet, hop and a little bitter.
Bottle @ Aarhus tasting. Clear amber with a white head. Aroma is sweet, malty, wheaty, yeasty and fruity. Flavor is medium sweet and light bitter. Sweet finish. 241015

Kindly shared by Jaghana. 1st Gotlandsdricke. Couleur brune trouble, tres légère mousse. Nez dalcool et note fruitée. Gout fruité malté avec légère épices, pomme et petite acidité alcool et citron. Corps moyen.

Bottle 33cl traded with Nisse666 many thanks. A cloudy amber beer with low head. Nose is on grain and yeast. Aroma is on grain, lot of yeast, toasted grain, spices, remind me amber bieres de garde with lot of yeast. Interesting to have a new style, but this is a very basic brew.
Bottle thanks to Benzai. Pours dirty orange gold white head. Nose/taste of tree bark, juniper, sea foam, exotic dark citrus fruits, lightly soured wheat and granny apple - medium body.
hay, citrus, herbs, cheese, earthy, leaves, golden, cloudy, white foam, medium sweetness, lightly bitter, lightly sour, medium body, oily feel, average carbonation, long finish,

Bottle.
Lovely Amber white head.
Aroma of yeast apricot, satsumas.
Taste nice peach and almonds, some sweetness. A bit flat finish.
Strange but I like it.

Bottle from systembolaget Visby. 
Pours brownish orange. 
Sweet aroma of juniper wood. 
Sweet and full bodied, taste of juniper, carrots and some orange. Hint of tartness. Quite drinkable for a "traditional ale".

Clear warm reddish golden colour, white head. Aroma of yeast, banana, apple. Flavour of apple, malts, light sweet malts. Malty finish, sweet apple.(From 33cL bottle @ home, Help Benzai to 10 Sahti/Gotlansdricke Ticks Tasting. From trade with Cunningham, thanks Henrik!!)

Bottle shared by Martinus @ Help Benzai to 10 Sahti/Gotlandsdricke/Koduõlu - ticks tasting. Clear orange color, small to average sized off-white head. Smell and taste malts, lightly red fruit, a slightly dry texture and a sweetish hint in the background. It also reminds me of apricot somehow. Average body, decent carbonation. Interesting beer.

Bottled from Systembolaget
Hazy, deep amber with a small head. 
Somewhat fruity and estery aroma with some green apples. 
Metallic and spicy flavour. 
Strange and crisp.
330 ml bottle at Spritmuseum. Hazy amber with small white head. Aroma and taste has caramel, dried fruit, some banana, light alcohol, yeasty esters, hay and grass.

Bottle from a trade with Cunningham. Pours clear deep golden with a tiny white head. Aroma is malty, some flowers and herbal notes as well. Taste is light sweet malty, "dark" herbal malts, with short duration. Almost flat carbonated.Interesting beer.

Bottle from Cunningham, many thanks Henrik.Hazy amber golden color with huge off-white head. Not very pleasant aroma of malt, butterscotch, caramel, fruity notes. Taste, wheat, herbs, banana, some spices, malt, yeast, caramel. Refreshing beer.

Unclear dark golden color with a small off white head that ends up in a thin layer. A bit overripe fruity and malty aroma. Medium (+) body. Tad sweet and a moderate bitterness. Average to soft carbonation. Although it is sweet, it is not over the edge. A bit dried fruit syrup feeling. Also herbal, some banana, mild yeast and malty. A bit refreshing actually. Nice one. Although the aroma was not to inviting. Not many Gotlandsdricku for general sale. Only this I think.[Bottle from Systembolaget web order in Sweden]

Bottle from web SB (thx Cunningham for the tips) cons 2015-02-19 Duved
AR: wee yeasty, glue, wee bit of greenasparagus
AP: very hazy mahogny, frothy ofwhite fluffy and steady foam
F: fizzy, belgian yeasty, sharp wee bubbly - that goes well with the sweet and raw yeastyness, ripe fruity, bready, syrup
Tåkete brun med høyt offwhite skum. Røde bær og fruktlukter. Også søtlige fruktige smaker, svært lett bitterhet. Lett. Kort søtlig i avslutningen. Medium kullsyre.
Bottle. Hazy golden beer with a small head. Candy aroma with some fruity notes. Fruity flavour wuth some yeasty and citrus and candy notes.

Bottle bought in Visby. (thanks Jonas)

Hazy orange/amber with a small white head. Aroma and taste of caramel, dried fruit, some banana, yeast and grass. Medium sweet and with a fairly light body. Quite interesting.
Smak och doft av humle, vete, malt, korn, grön banan, örter, vindruvor med toner av trä. Stor sötma, rund och len, mild beska med toner av citrus. Fin!

Bottled (thanks omhper!). Hazy orange colour, small white head. Aroma is fruity, mildly spicy along with some mild wooden notes. Flavour is banana, some spices, mild wood, some sweet malts as well as a mild bitterness to it. Quite pleasant and refreshing.
330ml Bottle - Amber with a small head. Yeast, dried apricot and sultanas in the aroma. Fruity and slightly buttery taste with apricot, peach, sultanas and caramel.

Bottle from Systembolaget. Cloudy golden beer with a small head. Caramel and candy aroma, yeast, grapes, citrus, bready, some banana. Fruity yeasty flavor, warming alcohol, bread, citrus, candy, some caramel. Decent but rather sweet.
Bottle 33cl. A cloudy amber colour with a medium sized off-white head. An aroma of caramel, bubble-gum, and grass. The taste is medium sweet and medium bitter.

Caramel and sweetness in the aroma. Taste is of metal, slightly fruity and yeast. Weak bitterness which fills the upper part of the mouth of a weak moment. Follow me @ Kung av öl @ Facebook for more pictures and ratings.

How: Bottle.
Where: Systembolaget.
Appearance: Hazy amber colour with an off-white head.
Aroma: Caramel, banana, malt, fruit.
Body: Medium body and carbonation.
Flavour: Caramel, fruit, grass.

Bottled, from Systembolaget.  Cloudy amber, mid sized head. Yeastr driven nose with pear, banana and caramel. Mid sweet with light-medium body and soft mouthfeel. Interesting flavour profile - perfumy bubblegum, pistacchio, pear and caramel, notes of grass and smoke. Fairly low bitterness. Harmonious and well drinkable.
330ml bottle. Hazy dark amber body with a low brief crown. Caramel, nuts, a hint of butterscotch, and fruit. Dry finish with flavors of yeast that reminds of finnish home made light beer.

Bottle (33 cl) from Systembolaget. Shady amber, medium off-white head. Nutty and slightly caramelly malt aroma, some fruity pear esters and bubble gum phenolics. Light to medium bodied, medium carbonation. Semi dry, low to mmedium bitterness.
